price: (88) And [Allāh acknowledges] his saying,[1455] "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [1455]- i.e., the complaint of Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ) about his people.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
